name: Context Menu
description: Desktop-style context menu overlay for editable text and custom actions.

use: you need right-click or long-press menu actions.
you want consistent menu styling with `menu` primitives.
avoid: a simple inline menu or toolbar is enough.

patterns.title: Custom popup anchor
patterns.code:
ContextMenuPopup(
  anchorContext: context,
  position: const Offset(200, 200),
  children: [
    MenuButton(child: const Text('Delete'), onPressed: (context) {}),
  ],
)

theming: Use `ContextMenuTheme` via `ComponentTheme` to adjust blur and surface opacity.
accessibility: Ensure menu actions can be triggered via keyboard or long-press.
do: Keep menus short and grouped with dividers.
dont: Hide critical actions solely in the context menu.
